comparison between software delivery Pipelines and Rube Goldberg machines one there's a
lot of moving parts we all know this anyone who's been involved in this process knows there's a lot of stuff you

characteristic of Rube Goldberg it's on purpose for us we don't like them to be

that self-operating napkin for example might kick you in the face it's definitely unsafe I know that there's

tendency to build them in a happy path way and when they break it can be
disastrous plus there's a lot that has come out along the lines of security
